content:
Hi all -- you may have seen that I just posted a pre-RFC to discuss something I've been thinking about and talking with some others about for a little bit now. Namely, I think we might want a DSL in which to express our instruction lowering patterns. I'd love to hear others' feedback on this! @Andrew Brown @Johnnie Birch @Anton Kirilov @fitzgen (he/him) @Dan Gohman @bjorn3

Pre-RFC: Instruction Selector DSL for Cranelift. by cfallin 路 Pull Request #13 路 bytecodealliance/rfcs
Rendered Summary This pre-RFC aims to describe the case for developing or adopting a DSL to write instruction selection/lowering rules in Cranelift backends, and to introduce discussion points. The...
